channel.title: Ray Bradbury on Tobyblog
channel.description: Recent content in Ray Bradbury on Tobyblog

item.title: My Love, She Weeps At Many Things
item.description:
<img src="https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7896/46298054945_02b92269c8_k.jpg" alt="Nightstand">
<figcaption class="wp-caption-text">Nightstand — Photo by <a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/tobyjmarks/">Tobyblog</a> on <a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/tobyjmarks/46298054945/" title="Nightstand">Flickr</a></figcaption>

My love, she weeps at many things, I would not for the world stop up her tears; She came in many years of drought And taught me just how right was private rain To touch the dust with smallest storm With emerald droppings from her eyes.

item.title: Return of the Super Meganerd Fun Pack
item.description:
<img src="https://farm1.staticflickr.com/890/41456059161_9dd099eb32_k.jpg" alt="The Super Mega Nerd Fun Pack 2">
<figcaption class="wp-caption-text">The Super Mega Nerd Fun Pack 2 — Photo by <a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/tobyjmarks/">Tobyblog</a> on <a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/tobyjmarks/41456059161/" title="The Super Mega Nerd Fun Pack 2">Flickr</a></figcaption>

Could this be the start of a grand birthday tradition? Watch me unbox the second giant care package gifted to me by my cousin, friend, and frequent collaborator — Carl!
